#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = a; i<b; i++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
typedef pair<ll,ll> ppl;
string s;
ll dp[100][100];
ll fun(int l ,int r)
{
	if(l>r) return 0; 
	if(l==r)
		return 1;
	if(dp[l][r]!=-1)
		return dp[l][r];
	int ans= 0 ;
	if(s[l]==s[r])
		ans = 1+ fun(l+1 , r ) + fun(l , r-1);
	else
		ans =  fun(l+1 , r) + fun(l , r-1) - fun(l+1, r-1);
	return dp[l][r] = ans;
}
int main()
{
	int t ; 
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s;
		memset(dp , -1, sizeof(dp));
		int n = s.size();
		ll ans = fun(0 , n-1);
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
